alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Palo Duro Canyon; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 1:38AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG AND EAST CENTRAL RANDALL COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM CDT... At 138 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palo Duro Canyon, or 16 miles east of Canyon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Wayside and Palo Duro Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
